short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the style of your writing anywhere on the web and make sure it’s inclusive and diverse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inlexa is a software that checks the style of your writing and suggests changes to make it more inclusive and diverse.

Currently, it’s only available in Spanish (Spain). We'll soon add more languages, like Catalan.
